synopsis.text: The narrative revolves around Mikako Kouda, a vibrant 16-year-old with a passion for fashion design and a dream to establish her own clothing line. Attending the prestigious Yazawa Art School alongside her childhood companion, Tsutomu Yamaguchi, their friendship takes an unexpected turn when Tsutomu's striking resemblance to a famous singer propels him into popularity among the girls. As Mikako begins to view Tsutomu in a new light, they navigate the complexities of love, friendship, and personal ambitions in this heartwarming tale of adolescence.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
